<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if one position is visible from another position and how much. The results can be affected by [[getTerrainGrid]] value, especially if position is near the ground. Particle effects such as smoke can also affect the results.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [ignore, LOD, ignore2] [[checkVisibility]] [beg, end]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [ignore, LOD, ignore2]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> ignore: [[Object]] - object to exclude from calculations

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> LOD: [[String]] - level of details to use. Possible values are: <tt>"FIRE"</tt>, <tt>"VIEW"</tt>, <tt>"GEOM"</tt>, <tt>"IFIRE"</tt>, <tt>"PHYSX"</tt> - PhysX geometry LOD (since Arma 3 v2.01.146666)

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> ignore2 (Optional): [[Object]] - second object to exclude from calculations (Since Arma 3 v1.61.136673)

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> [beg, end]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> beg: [[Array]] - start position in format [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> end: [[Array]] - end position in format [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - how much end position is visible to start position in range 0..1, where 1 is fully visible.

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cansee = [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[objNull]], "VIEW"] [[checkVisibility]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[eyePos]] [[player]], [[eyePos]] unit1];</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[lineIntersectsObjs]], [[intersect]], [[terrainIntersect]], [[terrainIntersectASL]], [[terrainIntersectAtASL]], [[lineIntersects]], [[cursorObject]], [[cursorTarget]], [[disableRemoteSensors]]
</value></part></template>

<dd class="note">
Particles that have blockAIVisibility set to 1 will influence the result, but will not make checkVisibility return 0. Instead an extremly small number will be returned.<br>
Distance, fog, overcast, rain and nighttime have no effect on the result.
</dd>
